ygData.subject: Re: List of skill caps
ygData.messageBody:
Track is capped at 100.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Proteus [mailto:pr0teus@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 26, 1999 12:52 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] List of skill caps
>
>
> From: Proteus <pr0teus@...>
>
> List of skill caps for Human Bard (I believe these are the
> same for Half
> Elves also).
>
> Percussion: 200
> String: 200
> Dodge: 125
> Brass: 200
> Forage: 40
> Wind: 200
> Dual Wield: 200
> Sneak: 75
> Safe fall: 40
> Hide: 40
> Disarm traps: ?
> Track: ?
> Pick lock: ?
>
> If you see any mistakes, feel free to correct this list. I
> hear tracking
> skill goes pretty high, but mine is only at about 51 right now so I'm
> not certain.
>
> Maev Lorekeeper
> Tarew Marr
>
